CustomField.description: The date-time after which the master object's record are next scheduled to be deleted after insertion in Data Clean. Available in Action 'Deletion' and 'Deletion + Rollback'
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The date-time after which the master object's record are next scheduled to be deleted after insertion in Data Clean. Available in Action 'Deletion' and 'Deletion + Rollback'
CustomField.label: Delete-Scheduled Delete DateTime(Next)
